website_summaries.verdict: Set of 24 icicles comes in two lengths (12 at 3.5" and 12 at 5.5") to create a layered effect.
pros: A classier version of your grandparents' plastic icicles, these glass tubes reflect the tree lights, adding twinkles and depth to the decor
cons: They come individually wrapped which can be tedious and tricky to unwrap

customer_reviews.title: Tedious removal of the wrappings,  read my tip!
customer_reviews.text: After spending hours decorating your tree, these beautiful crystal like icicles are the perfect finishing touch. BUT BEWARE ! Each is individually tightly wrapped in a thin piece of tissue paper which is nearly impossible to remove. After enduring the tedious process of unwrapping and only getting 5 done in about 30 minutes, I came up with a solution! I soaked them in a bowl of warm soapy water, and rinsed the paper off under running water.
customer_reviews.author: kris-tina a.wilson

customer_reviews.title: disappointed a bit
customer_reviews.text: expected these to be nicer... It does not have the shape of an icicle, it is just a stick... the same thickness at the top and the bottom of the icicle not like on the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small tree covered entirely in spun glass icicles, most of which were twice the price of the Kurt Adler series. I ordered these to replace a few that had been lost or broken over the years, and they are identical in both size(s) and style to the more expensive ones I collected through the years. Quite a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Brent D. Seth

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! Delicate glass, they really do look like an icicle
customer_reviews.text: 2 different sizes. The box says what it is and has pictures. Each icicle is wrapped individually in paper and then they're group wrapped in bubble wrap. Looks like perfect original packaging. The strings that they come on are kind of a silver metallic thread, it's okay but you can't really see it from a distance anyway. They look great on a tree. Definitely feel like glass, and sparkle like they should. I didn't drop one to find out how breakable they are lol hopefully never do. Love love love them
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo beautiful in person. They sparkle even when lights are off, especially when the sun is shining through! It’s just sooo breathtaking. Honestly, seeing our xmas tree, here in Hawaii, where it’s humid yearound, makes us think and feel of winter and snow!!! Whenever we have guests come over, they immediately gravitate towards our tree— stunned and mesmerized by its beauty!!! Well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: If you like icycles on your tree..buy these. They are a very nice addition to my tree. They are packaged to avoid breakage. It is a pain getting the tissue paper unwrapped and I used hooks instead of the string provided . They glisten when the lights are on and look almost as good when they are off. The only problem we had was with one of them. It did not have a hole in the end to hang it from and we ended up throwing it away. The other 23 were fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hart

customer_reviews.title: Order More Than You Need
customer_reviews.text: These are nice icicles and look very good on the tree. However they are thin and delicate and there are bound to be some broken in the box. The last box had a total of 8 broken. The one before that had two broken. So I suggest ordering an extra box over what you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! Catches the light and sparkles!
customer_reviews.text: These icicles are really pretty! The way they catch the light adds a lot to the tree. I am so happy with this purchase! My tree has clear lights, but I think they would look good with any color lights. I was a little confused when they came in the mail because they box was in a Manila envelope and it was much smaller than I expected. I was worried they were going to be a glassy broken mess, but they were perfect! None were broken! They were all individually wrapped in tissue paper and the whole group was wrapped in bubble wrap and put in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken each time
customer_reviews.text: These are truly beautiful. However, I've had to exchange them three times because I kept getting boxes with one or more broken ornaments. I finally ordered a new one and waited for it to arrive to send the defective package back. That way I could replace any that arrived broken in the new package instead of going back and forth. They are not packaged well inside the box.
customer_reviews.author: Francisca A.

customer_reviews.title: Icicles reflect the lights
customer_reviews.text: I love the real glass icicles vs plastic ones. I love how they reflect the light. I removed the strings and used ornament hooks, which I bent so the icicles look like they are hanging directly from the branch tips. You don't see icicles hanging from strings in nature so these look more realistic hanging directly from the tips with the ornament hooks that I shortened.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 7.5 foot tree and I ordered two boxes which was plenty for my tree (though I didn't have to decorate around the whole tree as it is in the corner). They were just what I was looking for and really compliment the tree beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: REAL nice!
customer_reviews.text: The icicles are different sizes and just right in weight to hang on the ends of tree branches. I love glass ornaments, but they can be heavy or too long to hang on a real tree. Bought these after Christmas and can hardly wait to use them next year. They are individually wrapped and; therefore, arrived in perfect condition. My only concern is that I may need more!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: More than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted glass icicles and have found them to be a little pricey. However I am so glad I came across these the price caught my attention so I bought 2 sets. They arrived and are beautiful and more than I expected. I love the fact they were individually wrapped so that I could get them safe and sound. I AM REALLY EXCITED FOR CHRISTMAS NOW
customer_reviews.author: Adiv Reader

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful high quality
customer_reviews.text: These look just like hanging ice. So beautiful. Each wrapped individually and well cared for. Just beautiful. I honestly didn’t want to put the ornaments on the tree because how beautiful these are but my husband kissed them. Still beautiful with the ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: HDoyle

customer_reviews.title: GET THEM! GET LOTS OF THEM! THEY ARE GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 10 boxes -- that's 240 icicles to cover a 4-foot tree. OUTSTANDING, if I do say so myself. Items come very well packaged, not one broken icicle. Worth every penny! Don't bother with those dull imitation plastic icicles, these glass ones are beautifully clear, pick up the light and make the tree sparkle. Lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Guy

customer_reviews.title: ... crystal icicles about 25 years ago and have always loved the look of them on our Christmas tree
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought a set of 12 crystal icicles about 25 years ago and have always loved the look of them on our Christmas tree. However, over the years, several have gotten chipped or have broken. I have looked for more over the years, but never found replacements. I was excited to have found these. They are beautiful, exactly what I was looking for. They came in a sturdy box and individually wrapped in tissue. They arrived in perfect condition. My husband and I are extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G.

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I finally found these again
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I finally found these again!! My Mom always put these on our tree when we were kids. I loved them! Couldn't find anywhere...every store that had the icicles had them in plastic, not glass :( Then I found these. When they arrived I was very satisfied! Real glass, no broken pcs, and nice assortment. Beautiful decoration and addition to my tree!
customer_reviews.author: Briana Defibaugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for decorating any kind of Christmas scene
customer_reviews.text: I love these - we all did. Used a whole set on our six foot tree, and they covered perfectly. Need more for next time - they can easily hang from a doorway garland, or anything needing a beautiful sparkle! and they look like the real deal in the Christmas lights. Great price and very carefully wrapped - not one broken icicle! Thanks very much.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Sapinski

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to your tree!
customer_reviews.text: These Kurt Adler glass icicles are the most beautiful item I have ever purchased for our tree. I purchased 4 boxes for our 7 1/2' tree, but you could get by with 3 for a tree that size. Yes, they are glass, and yes, they are breakable, but if you want icicles that reflect the lights, you want glass, not something unbreakable. Our tree looks like it's dripping in icicles. I just sit in the dark and stare at its beauty, enhanced ten-fold by these wonderful icicles.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Delicate but gorgeous glass icicles for tree or other decoration
customer_reviews.text: For the "value for money" aspect I would give more stars if they were available. These are beautiful, clear twisted glass, and you get 2 dozen in a box, 12 short and 12 long. I have seen boxes of just 9 or 10 costing more. They are carefully packed. I was very pleased with them!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Great Kurt Adler Glass Icicle Ornaments!
customer_reviews.text: This is another quality item from Kurt Adler. These will add a nostalgic feel to your tree. I remember my Grandma (born 1912) telling me years ago these types of things were used on Christmas Trees when she was a child. Each Icicle Ornament is wrapped in tissue paper to help prevent damage. The contents is then wrapped in corrugated cardboard to cushion the ornaments. The exterior box is very sturdy. Amazon also has done a great job in packing this item to assure that no breakage occurs. Very pleased with purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: You’d Swear They’re Real Icicles!
customer_reviews.text: These are actual glass. Each glass icicle is individually wrapped, and not one was broken upon arrival at my house. They come from the box ready to hang. A silver thread is already tied to each. These are gorgeous and resemble real icicles, especially with their varying sizes.
customer_reviews.author: BarB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: 3 were broken upon arrival, but the overall quality of these ornaments for the price makes up for that. I'm sure if I contacted the company I could get replacements but I haven't done that yet. Very impressed with the look and feel of these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: SinonBC

customer_reviews.title: You can never have too many icicles on the tree!
customer_reviews.text: I started purchasing glass icicles about 30 years ago. Over the years, I have purchased about 30 dozen of them, and am, today, ordering more! They pick up the light from the clear bulbs on the tree, and you can place them back under the branches. Three sizes mean you never have one "touching" a branch below so they all have movement. The Kurt Adler icicles are the best & the boxes are great for storage. Every year, people comment on how beautiful they are!
customer_reviews.author: PSUGrammy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I use icicle ornaments on my tree, mantel garland and teardrops on the staircase. Light reflect beautifully and picture does no justice how nice icicles look. Each icicle is individually wrapped in a soft tissue and comes with a silver string which I plan to replace every year but haven’t done so. This is third time I’m using these ornaments and none broke.
customer_reviews.author: white_lilac

customer_reviews.title: Good for a larger collection
customer_reviews.text: These sizes would be too limited if they are your only icicle ornaments. The 3.5 inch in particular would be disappointing. In a larger collection however they are great and the 3.5 inch fits all the nooks and crannies in the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait for Christmas!  🌲
customer_reviews.text: I’m so impressed before even hanging te on the tree! The quality and size are great. Just know they are going to give so much more sparkle to the tree! Can’t wait!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I needed new glass icicles since my old ones from years ago are mostly broken and gone. I got these on sale after Christmas day and I love them! The size variation is nice and I love how the light bounces off of them. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: These icicles are real glass, individually wrapped, and so COOL!
customer_reviews.text: These little icicles are so cool! Each were individually wrapped in tissue paper to make sure the arrived safe, and it worked. Every single icicle was in perfect condition. They are smaller than I thought they were, so for a 7.5' tree, I would recommend 2 boxes. Once you hang them you will realize why you want so many. They are absolutely stunning. They are real glass, and if you do some creative hanger hiding, they look just like real icicles hanging from your tree. With some bright LED lights behing them they are really something to see.
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Icicles everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I love these icicles! I started out buying just one box to see if I liked them. I’m ordering my fourth box tonight because they’re almost gone and nothing makes my tree as frosty/icy as these beautiful glass ornaments. I don’t mind the silver thread hangers at all. My tree is slightly flocked and they blend right in. Silver, ice, gold, crystal, red ornaments, etc. Beautiful. I hope to enjoy them for many years to come. My mother would love this look. You just don’t get more special than that!
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Makes my Christmas tree sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: I was raised with the old fashioned metal icicles. We took them off the tree and saved them for next year, every year. They finally wore out and I found these glass icicles at a reanabe price, Yes, I have 3+ boxes on my tree every year now! They sparkle best with the tree lights on, but they do sparkle all the time, light on or off!
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, these ornaments. They are beautiful, not cheesy looking at all. I use them on the Christmas tree and they pick up and reflect the lights. So lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine M.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Stunning addition to my tree! Thrilled that they listened to other customers and used a different packaging. It’s super easy to remove the tissue paper from each individually wrapped icicle. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: PDW Family

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Kurt Adler you did your thing these are some beautiful glass icicles which even came individually wrapped. What a big smile came cross my face when I unwrapped the first icicle. Very anxious to put my tree together now. I feel money well spent. I just wish they came in a beautiful gift box. But what’s inside is all that matters and that was beauty. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: qiana paige

customer_reviews.title: So pretty
customer_reviews.text: They're so pretty - came wrapped individually in tissue paper-& they look great on the tree. There are many - enough for a large tree. Just very fragile repackaging may be tricky. The price is great too
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Elegant glass icicles
customer_reviews.text: These look amazing on the tree. I love that they come with two different sizes. They are glass and fragile but none were broken and they seem very elegant. One package was the perfect amount for our 7.5 foot tree.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Good product and affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice.! Looks like real icicles. Looks great in my Christmas tree. It was individually wrapped inside the box. It came m 12 pcs. Of small icicles and 12 pcs. Of the big ones. I’ll buy another box of this soon.
customer_reviews.author: Meriwen

customer_reviews.title: Some Glass Icicles arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: These glass icicles are petite and fragile but beautiful. The box came smashed inside an Amazon package mailer. Two of the 5.5 icicles were broken. They should have been sent in a protective wrapped box, not bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Grace

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and add a lot of sparkle to the tree. Come attached with hanging string but I cut the string and replaced with a tree ornament hook. Easier to put on tree and look much better hanging. Had plastic before and no comparison to these glass icicles. A lot for the money. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: these are the best glass icicles on amazon! made our tree look fantastic. best part? they are in 2 sizes. shorter and longer. so variety with your icicles is a good thing on a well decked out tree!!
customer_reviews.author: 84DENTAL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They are beautiful on our Christmas tree. I have them on all my trees in my house at Christmas time. They take a pretty tree and make it beautiful. They are delicate but no too. I have had many compliments on them. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Katz

customer_reviews.title: Love crystal icicles
customer_reviews.text: I have the same icicles. However mine are in the exactly the same boxes but you can only fit 12 per box. Wish the would make the bigger icicles again they make a bigger statement. I've had mine for 20 plus years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're beautiful....
customer_reviews.text: The icicles arrived intact and are absolutely beautiful on the tree. A little smaller than I expected but still a good value. It would be nice if there were a larger selection of sizes. Personally I would like some a little longer in addition to the sizes that I received. I'll probably get another box to more fully cover my tree.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K

customer_reviews.title: well packaged
customer_reviews.text: love the way the icicles look on the tree! my only complaint is that each individual icicle is wrapped in tissue paper, and some so tightly that you actually have to rip the paper off to get it out. This obviously means I will have to wrap them back up in something else when I pack them away for next year. Other than that, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: CathyR

customer_reviews.title: Wow and great
customer_reviews.text: So cute and durable! We’re using on birch trees so their light and just right. We got cheated out of a fake tree on here so using on birches!!!! Nice they fall don’t panic they don’t break
customer_reviews.author: girlyjohnnie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous on Your Tree
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I wasn’t expecting much from these, but I was pleasantly surprised once they arrived! Simple, almost understated, elegant and realistic, they were a gorgeous addition to our tree, garland and wreath. I may order more for next Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to your tree!!
customer_reviews.text: These pretty little ornaments are quite realistic, and as the info states, exquisitely delicate! A couple were broken upon arrival, and I want to emphasize how incredibly SHARP the broken edges are!! Be very careful and do NOT let kids hand these!! With regard to positioning these beauties, try to place each one as close to a light as possible!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. They're just the right size to hang on my tree. Just want to mention that they are clear. That may have been in the description but I don't honestly recall.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought these and I am just as happy as the first time. I always get so many complements on them. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Teed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on my Christmas tree! Catch the light beautifully, and though class and won’t usually survive a fall even onto carpeting, definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: P. Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Good value to provide variety of length for the icicles on my tree. The more expensive Department 56 icicles (7 and 11 inches) are, honestly, far more beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Chena

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected these glass ice sickles were so pretty and look amazing. I love these but they are very, very fragile and I will have to handle very carefully for them to last. Still I love them and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: misty mccrary

customer_reviews.title: CLEAR BEAUTIFUL ICICLES
customer_reviews.text: These icicles are beautifully clear and smooth. They come with hangers and look amazing with lights shining through. Each piece is wrapped separately so they don’t get scratched or broken. Very thoughtful packaging. I am very happy with this purchase. 😁
customer_reviews.author: D. E. White

customer_reviews.title: Delicate Glass Icicles Different Lengths
customer_reviews.text: Delicate glass icicles in different lengths that have silver hanging hooks attached. So very pleased with product. I used 2 boxes of 24 icicles on a 4ft tree and it looks so pretty. I just wish unwrapping each icicle could have been easier. But all arrived undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: VioletGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous sparkle for the tree
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these for my 9 ft tree last year. This year when I put them up, I decided I needed more so bought two more boxes! These are gorgeous and catch the light beautifully especially if you place them strategically next to your tree lights. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Flammajamma

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great value
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and a great value for the money. They were perfect to give as a work holiday gifts, each person receiving the larger icicles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was excellent, which is important in protecting these exquisite ornaments. They are truly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie LeBard

customer_reviews.title: They’re worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: They’re packaged well and look great on the tree. Sturdy enough to endure two maniacal 3 & 7 year old boys running by the tree and “accidentally” brushing up against it every chance they can get.
customer_reviews.author: liakins

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Great two lengths in one package. Delicate but silver cord on each looks subtle, elegant and is adjustable — and doesn’t require hooks. The box was ok, but seemed like an old supply. All icicles are individually wrapped and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Iitia

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These icicle ornaments are so beautiful. I ended up buying 2 more sets as gifts. Waiting for price to go down before I buy 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Athena M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Icicles
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty icicles for on the tree. Each icicle has silver thread attached for hanging. Each icicle is individually wrapped in the box.
customer_reviews.author: suezrph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Fragile
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful on the tree, but they are extremely fragile. I’d definitely buy them again, but if I had a rough child or pet, I wouldn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Thargrove

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Delicate Appearance
customer_reviews.text: These icicles are simply gorgeous! Delicate & lightweight. I bought one pack. I wish I had bought more! The 3 1/2 inch look perfect on a small tree or a little larger one. The 5 1/2 inch are perfect for a larger tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to my tree as smaller branches need smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: After many years, we finally bought a faux Christmas tree. Easier on me to bring in and set up. But as I looked at it it need icicles. Never had a tree that needed icicles but this one did. While I bought another brand of icicles I bought these as well as Kurt Adler set had assorted sizes. Very nice addition to my tree as smaller branches need smaller icicles. I was very pleased with these and they made the tree look wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. My wife loves them. I don't understand what the negative reviews are about because they are real glass and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful on tree. Not nearly as difficult to unwrap as someone said. Tear the paper at the wider end and it slides right out
customer_reviews.author: Nowobeta

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and  add a lovely touch  to the tree
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I ordered two packages and one package from my daughter-in-law
customer_reviews.author: a2znow

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are spirals. I was hoping for them to look more like natural ice cycles, but I should have paid closer attention. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: Tips on how to hang these for the greatest effect
customer_reviews.text: Cut off the string it comes with and attach about a 3" length of green floral wire. Then affix the ornament tight to the very tips of the branches so that they emulate how real icicles would form on the tree. Be sure to have one on all of the branches that stick out the most. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: aerich

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I'm so in love! They definitely add a touch of class to any tree. A little on the thin side but a very nice design. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Mobo S.

customer_reviews.title: I like them very much
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight and very easy to hang. They look great on my tree and sparkle when the light catches them. They are different sizes - some are short an some are long. They are fragile. They are a very "unobtrusive" ornament meaning they don't stand out or "pop" but they hang very nicely and quietly glimmer. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Rose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but buy more than one package for a standard sized tree.
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty! Our ornaments are souvenirs that we buy from all over the world. They're pretty, but i love a cohesive tree, so I bought a set of these to tie the whole thing together. Our tree is tiny (it's a tabletop tree as we live in a 500-square-foot studio). For a big tree I'd buy 3-4 sets of these. They're so pretty and they catch the light just like real icicles! Will repurchase when I have a bigger tree.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Maris Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Life like
customer_reviews.text: These were beautiful touch to the tree. Added realism. Packaged very well. Wrapped individually. Will buy more for next Christmas .
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: They break of dropped needs to be habdle with care. They look great in the tree and easy to store
customer_reviews.author: Sarabelen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful on my tree!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a box of 12 (different sizes). None were broken, seem durable and lightweight. They are glass and I dropped one and it did not break! Reordered 2 more and they arrived unbroken as well.!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Small.
customer_reviews.text: These are not the size I expected, they are tiny. I cannot see them in my tree. Would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Maree MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Love the two different sizes. Ordered more than I need but if any break I will have spares. They add just the right touch to add to my decorations on the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased customer

customer_reviews.title: They make a tree sparkle!
customer_reviews.text: I love these icicles on a Christmas tree! They reflect all the colors of the lights and add a special sparkle that is like nothing else. I also love the look of the icicle shapes, and the fact that they come in three sizes. I bought two packages, and use them all,
customer_reviews.author: S. Emigh

customer_reviews.title: They're the perfect length for giving your Christmas tree that icy effect
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! They're the perfect length for giving your Christmas tree that icy effect. The mix of two sizes makes it look very realistic. I love that they're real glass too and not some sort of plastic shatterproof material. I really dislike how everything is cheaply made today. These are not. I love them and you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Icicles add sparkle
customer_reviews.text: These added shimmer and sparkle to Christmas decor. They look more expensive than they are but wanted 2 sets for standard size tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mum

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my tree, it’s what I wanted for my small tree, not cheap feeling Or heavyweight
customer_reviews.author: Tmcbroom

customer_reviews.title: They shatter
customer_reviews.text: Not for a home with cats and wood or ceramic floors and a caregiver on 🩸 blood thinners
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glass ornaments, look terrific!
customer_reviews.text: These look great on our tree, they glisten in the light and the mix of sizes makes them look more natural. They look like ice cicles. One arrived broken but they are glass.
customer_reviews.author: Navyvette

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these to finish out the back of my tree and they are just as beautiful as my originals
customer_reviews.text: Have over 250 glass icicles hanging from my tree. Ordered these to finish out the back of my tree and they are just as beautiful as my originals. Came well packaged and quickly. The glass reflects the lights on the tree and truly makes it glow.
customer_reviews.author: stelgut

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are more beautiful than the picture. We bought them for decorations on a tree that will be sold to raise money for a community agency. Each icicle was individual wrapped in the box. The lights from this Christmas tree really make these glass icicles sparkle majestically!
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, and there are so many for the price! So glad I purchased, they look lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Simple beautiful! Going to buy another set for me and a few for stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.author: Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: So sparkly and lovely
customer_reviews.text: I loved the different sizes. They are glass, and are beautiful. They made the tree look so elegant. I ordered several sets. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Paper slid off each individually wrapped piece with no hassle. Beautiful glisten and sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Simply Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicate glass icicles, but boy, will they make an impression on your tree. They're absolutely gorgeous and priced right, I could not resist. Thankfully, I had no broken pieces and handled them very gingerly based off the reviews and the experience of some folks having had broken pieces. If you handle with care, these icicles are well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: They catch the light beautifully, but you do have to be careful with ...
customer_reviews.text: They catch the light beautifully,but you do have to be careful with the tiny ones. They have a tendency to get lost in the tree, so you have to place them just right and they will sparkle.
customer_reviews.author: dulce valente

customer_reviews.title: Low cost beautiful glass icicles.
customer_reviews.text: Not too large, just right. I should have purchased more. They really are glass and they look beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: These were perfect! The 2 sizes are great to fit in ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and a couple others to try because I needed more glass icicles for my tree hoping I could find something similar to the blown glass icicles I've had for years. These were perfect! The 2 sizes are great to fit in just the right places. I loved them so much I ordered another box! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great find.
customer_reviews.text: Just like my moms vintage ones. She had broken a few this year & I was very pleased to find these just like her vintage ones. She was very pleased to receive these.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect finishing touch!
customer_reviews.text: I love these icicles! They are so delicate and give just the perfect finishing touch on my tree. I would recommend these to anyone. They were well packaged as well, so none arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I expected really nice glass icicles. It feels like plastic and looks like plastic. However, they look OK on the Christmas tree with a lot of lights and ornaments.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Island

customer_reviews.title: A sweet addition to all Christmas decoration collections
customer_reviews.text: Growing up with a summertime Christmas meant not having a wintry theme with any Christmas decorations. Now that I live where it does get cold I wanted to add to my tree trimmings. These are really lovely. There are a few different types/sizes/styles that come in this order. They are big enough that they add a really classic touch but not so big that they weight down branches or detract from other decorations. Caution: they do break somewhat easily. I had one fall off our tree from a height of less than a foot and it snapped. The good news is that it didn't splinter. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rellZ0r

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and great simulator of Winter spirit
customer_reviews.text: Thank you to whoever took the time to individually wrap these icicle decorations and thank you to the manufacturer/designers who made these variable shapes. These really made the tree take on that winter vibe and our trees can use it because we only get 3 seasons in FL: warm, hot, armpit hot/sauna
customer_reviews.author: Dianita

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect! We use to hang plastic ones on the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! We use to hang plastic ones on the tree when I was little and I've been looking for something similar. These are a bit smaller but they are beautiful. I bought two boxes and I am glad I did! They all arrived in tact also which I thought was amazing. I cant wait to put them on the tree next month!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to the Christmas tree! Well made and well packaged. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.C.

product_meta.title: Kurt Adler 3-1/2-Inch-5-1/2-Inch Clear Glass Icicle Ornament Set of 24 Pieces
product_meta.description: This Clear Glass Icicle Ornament Set by Kurt Adler is a beautiful, classic way to add to your holiday décor. Ranging in size from 3-1/2 inches to 5-1/2 inches, each icicle ornament features a beautifully realistic dripping design, perfect for adding an icy, wintry feel to your Christmas tree. Each box contains 24 pieces. Grab these classic icicle ornaments today for a timeless additional to your holiday ornament collection.
feature_bullets: Set of 24 includes: 12 pieces 3.5" and 12 pieces 5.5" icicles in the package
